# News
******  

- Our paper on climate vulnerability has been accepted in *Journal of Biogeography*. Source code [here](https://github.com/phytomosaic/vuln){target="_blank"}.  

- Joined [Stanton lab](https://cbs.umn.edu/contacts/daniel-stanton-0){target="_blank"} and the [Market Science](https://cbs.umn.edu/market-science/about){target="_blank"} outreach team to share the wonders of lichens with all ages at the Minnesota State Fair.  

- Continued our 6th year of long-term lichen monitoring at the [SPRUCE](https://mnspruce.ornl.gov){target="_blank"} whole-ecosystem warming experiment.  

- [Our paper](doi:10.1002/ajb2.1022){target="_blank"} sharing initial SPRUCE findings is now published in *American Journal of Botany*.  

- New [ELON](https://elonpreview.weebly.com/){target="_blank"} stations continue to be installed throughout the western U.S.
